entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 22 Aug 2023 08:03:13
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Six HBCU alumni who worked on Netflix's They Cloned Tyrone - ClutchPoints
- Petal 1 Visa credit card review: You don't need a credit history to qualify, and it earns 2% to 10% cash back at select merchants
- The Best Credit Cards for Average or Fair Credit of 2023
- Reid Hoffman reportedly compared Elon Musk's behavior during a merger to someone hiding a sexually transmitted disease from their spouse
- Popular Direct Review: Savings Accounts and CDs With Competitive Interest Rates
- Trump's $200,000 bond in his Georgia RICO case is the first time he's on the hook for cash in his criminal cases
- Surface-to-air missiles are getting a workout in the Ukraine war — and not just shooting down enemy missiles and aircraft
- A plane passenger smuggling weapons was caught after he lit up a cigarette in the bathroom and flight attendants smelled the smoke, prosecutor says
- Baghdad closes LED advert screens after hacker shows porn film on a screen
- FreeBSD Experimenting with a Port of Nvidia's Linux Open DRM Kernel Driver
- Tell every PC gamer you know: Dough, formerly Eve, is ready to issue refunds
- X says it’s fixed the bug that broke links and images in pre-December 2014 tweets
- Chip company Arm files for Nasdaq listing in IPO anticipated to be this year’s biggest
- The Future of Language Models: Embracing Multi-Modality for Enhanced User Experiences
- Microsoft Mixed Reality Toolkit 3 (MRTK3) moves to an independent organization within GitHub

Business:
- Why a Data Mesh of data products delivers financial insights faster
- How your CX strategy can help you create new digital revenue streams
- The future of digital payments: Monetization and value creation in the next normal
- Three ways to maximize the business value of AI and ML
- What it takes to become a mature product organization — and what’s in it for your customers
- Why three coastal Florida cities are turning to tech to achieve sustainability

AI:
- The Future of Language Models: Embracing Multi-Modality for Enhanced User Experiences
- Seemingly AI-Written Book on Maui Wildfire Becomes Amazon Bestseller, Gets Taken Down

Insights:
- The tech section covers a range of topics including alumni working on Netflix's They Cloned Tyrone, credit card reviews, savings accounts, missile usage in the Ukraine war, and more.
- The business section focuses on data products, CX strategy, digital payments, AI and ML, and the benefits of becoming a mature product organization.
- The AI section highlights the future of language models and an AI-written book that gained popularity on Amazon.
- Overall, the insights gathered from these topics show the diverse and evolving nature of the tech, business, and AI industries.
